what, i got CM @ kaitnieks for making a joke kaitnieks found amusing

item.title: Where did the inside client hacking board go?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ollie:

But he needed to have contributed at Kait to have the CM in the first place, Kait’s CM system was pretty good, I’m sure he wouldn’t let someone in if they didn’t deserve it.

It was actually the same system we have here, but an automatic promotion to CM once anyone hit 50 rep. Here you get it after you hit 50 rep, but your rep is reviewed first, it isn’t automatic.

Read full topic
item.source: Where did the inside client hacking board go?

item.title: Where did the inside client hacking board go?
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“Freddy1990, post:18, topic:301170”][quote author=Cowie` link=topic=397468.msg2994894#msg2994894 date=1255521622]

You just need to be voted in by the current people that have access, so you could ask any of them to start a poll for you.

Hey, why’d you kick me out? I had access long before I became staff…

That’s called being a CM before you became staff, if this warrents access to the section lets give everyone who’s a CM acc-oh wait.
[/quote]

Hmm, I inherited CM status from kaitnieks.com …[/quote]

Hmm, so that automatically means you know what you’re saying …

Read full topic

item.title: Where did the inside client hacking board go?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

peterbjornx:

i had access before?

The access and such was just changed the other day. I’d venture to say if you posted about anything in relation to cheating you would be voted in based on that and your previous experience.

Read full topic

item.title: Where did the inside client hacking board go?
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

[quote=“peterbjornx, post:11, topic:301170”]i had access before?[/quote]/care now let this thread die before i hack u.
The CM’s have been chopped down to keep it a worth while achievement.
If you are seen to be a worthwhile contributor by the current CM’s, you will receive your access once again. Just wait and see. In the mean time post constructive posts across the board.

Read full topic
